name: TWO (Mayur Games)
description:
Made for the GE Game Jam  #3

the theme was :

       DUALITY

so in this game:

you have two characters and only two controls for them who are in two different worlds and they have to reach two different checkpoints to win and there are two levels 

there are two coins in a level and they don't really do anything you just collect them and nothing happens

there is also a gem in every level  that it is still just collectable it does nothing but it can say that you are rally great in this game cause getting them is hard

also  don't mind the spelling mistake and stuff i didn't have a lot of time

 be careful in the 2nd level as it is really hard

when you fall you can use r to restart 

 w to jump and s to change the direction of your character for player 1(red guy)

 and up arrow to jump and down arrow to switch direction for player2 (green guy)
